item.title: NPC dialogue not working
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

Not what I meant.

public void questionOptions(String question, String option_1, String option_2, String option_3) {
	sendFrame171(1, 2465);
	sendFrame171(0, 2468);
	sendFrame126(question, 2460);
	sendFrame126(option_1, 2461);
	sendFrame126(option_2, 2462);
	sendFrame126(option_3, 2463);
	sendFrame164(2459);
}

item.title: NPC dialogue not working
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Well, you see everything works great, except on this screen, the only answer you can click is the bottom one. Here are my NPC dialogue codes below:

case 1339: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Help, this forest has been over-run by ghouls and fiends!", 4885); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

And:

case 1340: sendFrame171(1, 2462); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460); sendFrame126("I'll help out once I learn the ropes of Ragescape.", 2461); sendFrame126("Let us rid these demons from hell back to their rightful place!", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

Read full topic
